tour_001.name: Annapurna Base Camp Trek
tour_001.description: Experience the beauty of the Annapurna range with stunning mountain views. This 14-day trek takes you through rhododendron forests, traditional Gurung villages, and offers breathtaking views of the Annapurna massif.

tour_002.description: The ultimate Himalayan adventure to the base of the world's highest mountain. This challenging 16-day trek offers unparalleled views and a true test of endurance.
